title: Provision of transplant education for patients starting dialysis: Disparities persist
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Vincenzo Villani, Luca Bertuzzi, Gabriel Butler, Paul Eliason, James W. Roberts, Nicole DePasquale, Christine Park, Lisa M. McElroy, Ryan C. McDevitt
